title: Next-generation vaccines against bacterial pathogens: mRNA and beyond.
abstract: The global rise of multidrug-resistant (MDR) bacterial infections has exacerbated the need for effective vaccines to prevent these hard-to-treat pathogens. Traditional vaccine approaches have achieved tremendous successes but often fall short for pathogens like
